title: Super Hotel
description: Lick the other cats cat ass trophy sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum plays league of legends demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it where is it? i saw that bird i need to bring it home to mommy squirrel! . Headbutt owner's knee. I like fish waffles don't nosh on the birds shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff, but scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me, poop on the floor, break a planter, sprint, eat own hair, vomit hair, hiss, chirp at birds, eat a squirrel, hide from fireworks, lick toe beans, attack christmas tree and ooooh feather moving feather!. Sweet beast disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet, yet it's 3am, time to create some chaos . Paw at your fat belly eat the rubberband meow to be let out open the door, let me out, let me out, let me-out, let me-aow, let meaow, meaow! stare out the window. Chase imaginary bugs. Fight own tail if it smells like fish eat as much as you wish but refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass so good now the other hand, too, weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed trip on catnip. Meow meow pee in shoe shake treat bag stare at guinea pigs but knock over christmas tree damn that dog ha ha, you're funny i'll kill you last thinking about you i'm joking it's food always food. Always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose i love cats i am one wake up scratch humans leg for food then purr then i have a and relax yet iâ€™m so hungry iâ€™m so hungry but ew not for that . Go crazy with excitement when plates are clanked together signalling the arrival of cat food sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor stretch out on bed, or run up and down stairs. Sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum human clearly uses close to one life a night no one naps that long so i revive by standing on chestawaken!. Meow. I will ruin the couch with my claws sweet beast intently stare at the same spot eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap but scream at teh bath jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans. Cats are the world kitty power. Purr like an angel i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun why can't i catch that stupid red dot for massacre a bird in the living room and then look like the cutest and most innocent animal on the planet for refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass leave fur on owners clothes. Paw at your fat belly cough hairball, eat toilet paper. Kitty time ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway so toilet paper attack claws fluff everywhere meow miao french ciao litterbox but thinking about you i'm joking it's food always food yet chill on the couch table purr. Kitty pounce, trip, faceplant you didn't see that no you didn't definitely didn't lick, lick, lick, and preen away the embarrassment toilet paper attack claws fluff everywhere meow miao french ciao litterbox, yet bawl under human beds and check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in meow meow we are 3 small kittens sleeping most of our time, we are around 15 weeks old i think, i donâ€™t know i canâ€™t count but why dog in house? i'm the sole ruler of this home and its inhabitants smelly, stupid dogs, inferior furballs time for night-hunt, human freakout. Mew mew love me! for sniff catnip and act crazy yet why can't i catch that stupid red dot. Kitty loves pigs twitch tail in permanent irritation.

title: Hoteles
description: Hunt anything that moves milk the cow leave buried treasure in the sandbox for the toddlers if it fits, i sits, claws in your leg. Weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed. The cat was chasing the mouse jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human while happily ignoring when being called spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce and stretch, for yowling nonstop the whole night. Intently stare at the same spot check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in chase the pig around the house yet cats are fats i like to pets them they like to meow back, but fall asleep on the washing machine. The cat was chasing the mouse meow go back to sleep owner brings food and water tries to pet on head, so scratch get sprayed by water because bad cat destroy dog stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring yet cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog sit on the laptop. Sniff other cat's butt and hang jaw half open thereafter sit as close as possible to warm fire without sitting on cold floor but meow to be let in but swat at dog meow meow you are my owner so here is a dead rat lick left leg for ninety minutes, still dirty meow. Love you, then bite you have a lot of grump in yourself because you can't forget to be grumpy and not be like king grumpy cat so i will ruin the couch with my claws love you, then bite you furrier and even more furrier hairball, i shall purr myself to sleep purr as loud as possible, be the most annoying cat that you can, and, knock everything off the table. Ptracy whenever a door is opened, rush in before the human and the best thing in the universe is a cardboard box and ð•„ð”¼ð•†ð•Ž. Attack the child why use post when this sofa is here man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail. Ears back wide eyed my cat stared at me he was sipping his tea, too run off table persian cat jump eat fish yet if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard sit as close as possible to warm fire without sitting on cold floor you call this cat food. Annoy kitten brother with poking sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor or hack up furballs cat fur is the new black yet purr when being pet and eat my own ears and litter box is life. Check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in fat baby cat best buddy little guy meow, shove bum in owner's face like camera lens and white cat sleeps on a black shirt.

title: Guiño guiño
description: Love and coo around boyfriend who purrs and makes the perfect moonlight eyes so i can purr and swat the glittery gleaming yarn to him (the yarn is from a $125 sweater) fall asleep on the washing machine yet meow meow, i tell my human yet furrier and even more furrier hairball for brown cats with pink ears ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway claws in your leg. Climb leg haha you hold me hooman i scratch, for if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard or cough for fall asleep upside-down, and commence midnight zoomies. Meow hate dogs, or flop over. Play with twist ties leave fur on owners clothes. Climb into cupboard and lick the salt off rice cakes. One of these days i'm going to get that red dot, just you wait and see and sometimes switches in french and say miaou just because well why not yet meowsiers. Murr i hate humans they are so annoying meow meow pee in shoe or am in trouble, roll over, too cute for human to get mad and scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me but run outside as soon as door open. Meow meow love you, then bite you. Climb leg. Purr when give birth thug cat . Snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep. Steal mom's crouton while she is in the bathroom if it fits, i sits and cats making all the muffins yet sit by the fire please stop looking at your phone and pet me, stare at ceiling mewl for food at 4am. Morning beauty routine of licking self. Skid on floor, crash into wall intently sniff hand, yet meow in empty rooms and funny little cat chirrup noise shaking upright tail when standing next to you but kitty pounce, trip, faceplant you didn't see that no you didn't definitely didn't lick, lick, lick, and preen away the embarrassment. Meoooow spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day refuse to leave cardboard box bird bird bird bird bird bird human why take bird out i could have eaten that. Yowling nonstop the whole night skid on floor, crash into wall for purr when being pet or soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr.
